description: Versatility and functionality. The hallmarks of high-quality XC pants. The kind you want when fun and performance are prioritized. Crafted to be windproof and water resistant, these pants offer weather protection and moisture management with loads of appreciable details like an elastic drawcord waistband, zippered hand pockets and a silicone gripper on the leg opening that you'll love. A lightweight do-it-all XC pant that is long on performance.
name: Odlo Brensholmen Pants - Mens
